Text:
why have the removed the rating feature of +1 on TPB ?

Thanks for the up btw !

peteragon  -  The rating system was an easily abused and very inacurate system so after years of debate TPB admins have removed it.  Feel free to read about it at the below link.

https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=18463
yep yep.. used far more often for punitive reasons than quality rating (just ask johnny goodfilms!!)

Great quality, A10 V9 - thnx to the uploader! Movie was OK as i expected it to be! Storyline is intelligent and entertaining and acters were OK! I usually watch all the movies at film.hdkalitesi.com because they have HD's but they didn't have this one so im happy to have piratebay :) Thnx once again for this great share!
